description: A tangy dressing and the crunch of walnuts makes this salad satisfying for a main course lunch or dinner.
name: Beetroot And Pumpkin Salad With Walnuts And Feta Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 butternut pumpkin, peeled and cut into 3cm cubes
1 small onion, peeled, halved and and sliced into half moons
1 medium avocado, peeled and cut into 2 cm chunks
250g baby beetroot, cooked and cut into eighths
100g feta cheese, cut into small cubes
0.75 cup fresh herb leaves (eg parsley and mint)
0.25 tsp salt and pepper (or to taste)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180 degrees. Place pumpkin cubes onto a baking paper lined oven tray and bake in hot oven for 10 minutes. After the first 5 minutes, sprinkle the walnut halves or pieces onto the tray and continue roasting with the pumpkin until a fork goes easily into it with just a bit of resistance. Remove tray from oven and allow to cool while proceeding with the recipe.
While the pumpkin is roasting, assemble the salad in a wide shallow dish, starting with the leaves, then onion, tomatoes, beetroot, feta and fresh herb leaves and avocado in any order.
Make a dressing by combining the pomegranate molasses, lemon juice and olive oil plus salt and pepper to taste.
Add cooled pumpkin to salad along with the walnut pieces, add salt and pepper to taste, pour the salad dressing over and toss lightly to combine.
